vShader: attribute vec2 aVertexPos;attribute vec2 aTexturePos;varying vec2 vTexturePos;void main () {gl_Position = vec4(aVertexPos, 1, 1);vTexturePos = aTexturePos;}
fShader: precision mediump float;uniform sampler2D uImage;varying vec2 vTexturePos;void main (){gl_FragColor = texture2D(uImage, vTexturePos);}
